credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Project for the Decoration of an Oblong Panel
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on white laid paper
description: A lyre form is composed of two cornucopias from which below stems rise.  They are connected above by a vase. The vase contains flower stems and spikes around which is a wreath with blue flowers. From the upper spirals hangs a ribbon with two entwined wreaths. The poins of the cornucopias are fastened together and connected with a caduceus by a ribbon.
name: Drawing
